protocol.name: P-GSE18624-2
protocol.text: A set of seedlings incubated at 12 ºC were shifted to 27 ºC. Samples (Whole seedlings) were collected before shifting (0 h) and 2 h and 24 h after shifting to 27 ºC by immediately freezing in liquid nitrogen.

protocol.name: P-GSE18624-3
protocol.text: Sterilized wild type Arabidopsis Col-0 as well as the arp6-10 mutant seeds were plated on half-strength MS plates without sugar. Plates were incubated at 4 ºC in dark  for 48 hours before transfering to 20 ºC  with light. 5 day old seedlings were transfered to 12 ºC incubaor with continuous light for 3 days befroe shifting to 27 ºC.

protocol.name: P-GSE18624-4
protocol.text: Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE18624-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix GeneChip® protocol (Affymetrix) from 1µg total RNA.

protocol.name: P-GSE18624-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 1µ ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45 ºC Arabidopsis ATH1 microarray. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station.

protocol.name: P-GSE18624-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip® Scanner 3000

protocol.name: P-GSE18624-8
protocol.text: Quality checks and data analyses were carried out using Affymetrix GeneChip® Operating Software(GCOS) and quality reporter
